key.name: hide-app-icon
key.description: Hides the icon of the currently focused app in the top panel of the GNOME shell.

key.name: hide-app-label
key.description: Hides the label of the currently focused app in the top panel of the GNOME shell.

key.name: hide-arrow
key.description: Hides the arrow which belongs to the menu of the currently focused app in the top panel of the GNOME shell.

key.name: margin
key.description: Allows to add a horizontal margin to the menu of the currently focused app in the top panel of the GNOME shell.
